content: The iPhone 13 Pro has a better display, the best camera, and incredible battery life.
The photo department is great and there is no heating. It's still the best video phone.
The iPhone 13 Pro Max is the best iPhone ever.
Buy the iPhone 13 Pro Max for the battery and keep it for the camera.
Apple wasn't kidding about the new sensors on the iPhone 13. The 3x zoom with night mode enabled is great.
The iPhone 13 battery life seems to be about the same or slightly better than the iPhone 13 lineup.
The iPhone 13 is amazing in all aspects. The performance is better, photography is good, and battery backup is best for long run.
The iPhone 13 Pro Max does everything you could want from a smartphone. This premium flagship packs a 120Hz refresh rate.
Reviewers have been largely impressed with the iPhone 13 Pro, and it has received mostly positive reviews.
With a new display, a bigger battery, and better camera and software features, the iPhone 13 sets a new benchmark for large phones.
The iPhone 13 mini is definitely a very cute phone. It is better that you stay on the 13 as the size of the device is almost same.
My 13 mini works perfectly fine so far, so I'll stick with it. It is way, way more smartphone than I need.
I just bought an IPHONE 13 pro max. Apple usually reduces the price of the old iPhone when it launches a new one.
I prefer 6.1” iPhones compared to the monster 6.7” iPhone 13 Pro Max which is too bulky. I bought the smaller size.
The battery life is unbelievable, easily getting two full days with heavy use. It's crazy with the higher refresh rate and 5G.
I'm really impressed with the iPhone 13 Pro Max battery. Even with heavy use, it lasts all day.
As a Samsung user, I'm jealous of the iPhone 13 battery life. My secondary iPhone 13 lasts so much longer.
Upgrading from my XS Max to the 13 Pro Max is a dream. The battery life is a game changer.
The battery is great, but the phone's size is inconvenient. The regular Pro is more portable and lasts long enough.
I forgot to charge my 13 Pro Max and it lasted three days with heavy use. The battery is amazing!
My 12 Pro battery sucks. I'm tempted to upgrade for the battery, cameras, and smaller notch.
The battery on my iPhone 13 is miles ahead of my 12 Pro Max. The 11 Pro Max had the best battery.
I'm impressed with the battery life compared to my S21 Ultra. The iPhone 13 Pro Max holds a charge!
The battery life is ridiculously good. I can easily get 3-4 days of use.
I'm shocked I get a full day without charging. The 12 Pro Max always needed a battery pack.
The best thing about this phone is the battery life. I can go a day without worrying about it.
This iPhone 13 is all about refinement. Slight but nice and welcomed improvements all around.
I'm tempted to upgrade for the camera and battery. Best Buy's trade-in offer is quite good.
I'm running an iPhone 8 and was going to go for the 13 mini, but the Pro cameras are tempting.
The 13 Pro is everything I wanted in the 12 Pro. I'm upgrading and passing the 12 Pro to family.
I have a 12 Pro Max, so I'll pass on this one. It's a great upgrade for those looking.
I'm excited for the macro camera. The automatic switching is weird and needs an off switch.
I don't understand people who say this phone is the same as last year's. It's an incremental upgrade.
The 11 hours of screen on time is life changing. I struggle to kill it on my day off.
The battery life is astonishing. I was practically tethered to a power cord with my iPhone X.
I'm using a Samsung S10 plus and I'm interested in the iPhone 13 for the better battery life.
My 11 Pro Max battery is degrading. Good to know the replacement will be exactly what I need.
I got 32 hours of casual use. Amazing performance and great to not have to top up during the day.
This is amazing battery life. I haven't been able to stretch it, since i do WFH these days.
The 13 mini feels so good holding it in one hand. I find the Pro Max to be too big.
The 120Hz screen is like a great bass player. Some might not notice, but everyone notices when its gone.
I love the iPhone 13 but I miss 3D Touch. The haptic engine feels substantially weaker too.
Upgrading from my iPhone 12 Pro to a 13 pro for $100. The battery is amazing!
Coming from XR I see a massive improvement. Phone lasts all day after gaming, browsing web, texting nonstop.
I upgraded from a iPhone 7 Plus, and the difference is huge, The fluidity, how insanely long the battery lasts.
I cannot believe the extraordinary battery life of the IPhone 13, upgrading from my 12 Pro Max soon.
The iPhone 13 can be heavy. Recommend 256gb for 4k ProRes. Screen is smooth and battery life is great.
This phone is truly amazing, even coming from a 12 Pro Max. Macro mode, Promotion, and battery life is insane.
I am on the iPhone XS. I am not sure if upgrading to the iPhone 13 is worth it.
Switched from Oneplus 7 to iPhone 13 mini for the form factor and cameras. Love the experience.
Just upgraded my SE to the 13 mini. I’m loving it so far. As long as Apple makes mini phones, I’ll buy them.
I really like the size and aesthetics of the iPhone 13 in black. I like bigger phones too.
I have been using the IPhone 13 mini for 5 days. This phone impresses me visually. It is perfect!
I wish I could adjust to the mini. The compromises in battery and screen are not justified.
Went from og SE to mini 13 and it’s been amazing. I miss the home button and the headphone jack
This isn’t for those of you on the 12. This is for those who have older phones like me.
I'm upgrading from an XR to the 6.1" 13. For me it's perfect for me in every way.
If you have an 11 or 12 this phone is just not for you but for ppl with older phones than that.
Decided 13 was adequate for my needs. The photos are nearly indistinguishable and the lighter weight is nice.
